data.title: The Formulas
data.solution:
from math import floor
r=input()
s=0
c=list(map(int,input().split()))
c.sort()
if r=="A":
 for i in c:s+=int(i)
 print(s//len(c))
elif r=="Q":
 for i in c:s+=int(i)**2
 print(floor((s/len(c))**0.5))
elif r=="G":
 s=1
 for i in c:s*=i
 print(floor(s**(1/len(c))))
data.statement:
You will be given a string [[c]] of numbers. 
- If the [[r]] string is the letter <<A>>, output the arithmetic mean rounded down 
- If the string [[r]] is <<Q>> output the Quadratic mean rounded down
- If the string [[r]] is <<G>> output the Geometric mean rounded down

<<Arithmetic mean>>
the sum of the numbers / the amount of numbers

for more info:
<<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arithmetic_mean>>

example:
Arithmetic mean of 1 2 3 4 7 = ( 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 7 ) / 5 = 3.4
Output 3 (round down)

<<Quadratic mean>>
the square root of (the sum of the numbers / the amount of numbers )

for more info:
<<https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/quadratic_mean>>

example:
Quadratic mean of 1 2 3 4 5 = square root of( ( 1² + 2² + 3² + 4² + 5² ) / 5 ) = 3

Geometric mean
the (count of the numbers) root ( the product of the numbers )

for more info:
<<https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/geometric_mean#English>>
data.constraints:
r = <<Q>>, <<A>>, <<G>>
c is string of numbers
data.stubGenerator:
read r:string(1)
read c:string(265)
write Arithmetic mean or Mediator or Quadratic mean or Geometric mean
data.inputDescription:
string [[r]] <<A>> or <<Q>> or <<G>>
string [[c]] of numbers
data.outputDescription: arithmetic mean of [[ c ]] rounded down if the [[r]] string is <<A>> if the string [[r]] is <<Q>> output the Quadratic mean rounded down if string [[r]] is <<G>> output Geometric mean rounded down
